plot: At Heather's fancy sushi party, Gina and Emily investigate a juicy rumor about Shannon and Heather's old friend, Nicole. While Shannon tries to shut down the rumor, Gina feels compelled to reveal the truth, resulting in an explosive string of arguments that shuts down Heather's party. After the dust settles, Shannon and Noella bond as Heather and her husband Terry wonder about Shannon's intentions. Emily and Shane discuss the role of faith in their marriage, while Dr. Jen and her husband Ryne explore their family dynamics. Feeling terrible about ruining Heather's party, Gina and Emily attempt to make amends.—Anonymous
